img_text: Saul Loeb/AFP/Getty Images "This whole two-week effort has been a calculated and orchestrated political hit fueled with apparent pent-up anger about President Trump and the 2016 election, fear that has been unfairly stoked about my judicial record, revenge on behalf of the Clintons, and millions of dollars in money from outside, left-wing opposition groups." JUDGE BRETT KAVANAUGH sboNEWS
